account_infomation_sub_title: This information is used to autofill your details to make it quicker for you to book. Your details will be stored securely and won't be shared publicly.
email_not_valid: The input is not valid E-mail!
password_rule: Passwords must be 6-20 characters long and contain at least 1 letter and 1 number
two_passwords_that_you_enter_is_inconsis: Two passwords that you enter is inconsistent!
password_has_number: Password must contain at least 1 number.
password_has_letters: Password must contain at least 1 letter.
password_has_uppercase: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase.
password_has_lowercase: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase.
